articles.title: Houston Astros' Alex Bregman homers twice in 21-5 rout of Chicago White Sox - ESPN
articles.description: Alex Bregman homered twice to help the Houston Astros score 21 runs against the Chicago White Sox, tied for the second-most runs in team history.
articles.content:
CHICAGO -- Alex Bregman hit two homers and two doubles, driving in a career-high six runs and powering the Houston Astros past the Chicago White Sox 21-5 on Thursday.

articles.description: Nicholas Gross turned it on late after Luke Potter's caddie inserted himself into a ruling between Gross and an official on No. 8.
